channel.title: Surface Tension - c2a5g
channel.description:
Hi,
the mortar control doesn't work every time. Especially after loading a savegame on that map I cannot see the crosshair on the screen where the airstrike should be triggered.
I needed to load the autosave in the vent, that falls down and run down all the way to have a working crosshair on screen.
As stated in another thread the performance is a little low on that map.
